most_active_tickets.title: Pieces OS apparently stuck - VS extension not working

common_issues.title: Pieces OS and VS Extension Errors
common_issues.description: Users experience issues with Pieces OS and its Visual Studio extension, including the OS getting stuck, the extension not detecting the running OS, and applets not working. This is often linked to problems with the OS server toolbar and communication between the extension and the OS. Solutions include updating the VS extension and Pieces OS to the latest versions, and investigating potential OS errors and port conflicts.

related_issues.title: Pieces OS apparently stuck - VS extension not working
related_issues.text:
Pieces OS apparently stuck - VS extension not working
### Software

Pieces OS, Visual Studio

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

10.1.14.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Hi, I have just installed Pieces on my Windows 11 laptop and I'm experiencing some problems, specifically with Pieces OS and the Visual Studio extension.
Somehow, the desktop app works fine.

Pieces OS seems stuck in the system tray. Every time I click it, a "Sentry Error Event" appears in the log file and the application doesn't do anything.
At the same time, the Visual Studio extension shows a window saying that Pieces OS is not running. If I click on the launch button, a "route not found" message appears for a moment and then the "Pieces OS is not running" message comes back.

I checked for updates on the Pieces Suite app, but there are no update.

I'm attaching the log file and the response of the http://localhost:1000/applications url. I tried navigating manually to the url opened by the launch button in Visual Studio [(url)](http://localhost:1000/?application=%7B%22name%22%3A%22VISUAL_STUDIO%22%2C%22platform%22%3A%22WINDOWS%22%2C%22privacy%22%3A%22OPEN%22%2C%22capabilities%22%3A%22BLENDED%22%2C%22mechanism%22%3A%22MANUAL%22%2C%22schema%22%3A%7B%22semantic%22%3A%22MAJOR_0_MINOR_0_PATCH_1%22%2C%22migration%22%3A0%7D%2C%22id%22%3A%229ab3c1de-0625-408e-8d42-8e2c48e11d0c%22%2C%22version%22%3A%223.0.0%22%2C%22onboarded%22%3Afalse%2C%22automaticUnload%22%3Afalse%7D&capabilities=1048575&theme=%7B%22darkMode%22%3Atrue%2C%22scaffoldBackgroundColor%22%3A-14737633%2C%22primary%22%3A-328966%2C%22secondary%22%3A-14737633%2C%22onPrimary%22%3A-10724260%2C%22onSecondary%22%3A-328966%2C%22primaryContainer%22%3A-13421773%2C%22surface%22%3A-13750738%2C%22onSurface%22%3A-328966%2C%22error%22%3A-934979%2C%22onError%22%3A-1%7D) and the response is "Route not found".

Thank you in advance.

[log-11252024.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17903747/log-11252024.txt)
[applications.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17903752/applications.txt)

## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key points raised:**

* The OS server toolbar is not launching correctly, causing issues for the user.
* The user tried launching the toolbar from various ways but nothing worked.
* The user reported the toolbar restarting on its own and applets not working.

**Problems identified:**

* A P0 (critical priority) issue with version 3.0.0 of the Visual Studio plugin during initialization.
* An issue with Pieces OS trying to host applets, possibly related to an OS error.
* The Dart language sdk not returning the actual OS error code.

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* Hotfix released for Visual Studio plugin version 3.0.1 (to resolve UI thread hang).
* Pieces OS version 10.1.15 released with changes on how ports are chosen for tool window integrations.

**Current status/outcome:**

* The initial solution did not fully resolve the user's issues.
* Further investigation is needed to identify the root cause of applet problems and the OS error.
* User is requested to schedule debugging session to investigate the issue further.

**Additional notes:**

* The conversation took place in November 2024, so the information might be outdated.
* It's unclear if the proposed solutions fully resolved the identified issues.

recommendations: **Investigate and address the root cause of the "Pieces OS apparently stuck - VS extension not working" issue:** This is a critical issue affecting users and has a high activity level. Resolving this should be a top priority.

**Improve error handling and reporting in Pieces OS and its Visual Studio extension:** Provide more informative error messages to users and log detailed error information for debugging. This will help identify and resolve issues faster.

**Review and update documentation for Pieces OS and its Visual Studio extension:** Ensure the documentation is up-to-date and covers common issues and troubleshooting steps. This will empower users to self-resolve problems.

**Consider implementing a system for automatically detecting and suggesting solutions to known issues:** This could be integrated into the Pieces OS desktop app or the Visual Studio extension, providing users with quick and easy solutions to common problems.

**Monitor the effectiveness of the implemented solutions and make further adjustments as needed:** Continuously track the number of support tickets, common issues, and user feedback to identify areas for improvement in the support process.
